== Pangri (565807) ==

Pangri is a village in the [[Sangameshwar]] taluka of [[Ratnagiri]] district with an area of 794.57 hectares and harbouring 320 households with total population of 1125 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Ratnagiri]] is at a distance of 28 km. Male population is 499 and female population is 626. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 565807<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
